title: Kaia Gerber cuts a chic figure in denim bottoms with suede and leather jacket while stepping out NYC
text:
She attended Bella Hadid's 23rd birthday bash at the restaurant and bar at Saks Fifth Avenue in Manhattan on Thursday night.

And one day later, Kaia Gerber made the sidewalk her runway as she stepped out in a stylish look while out in Soho.



The 18-year-old model strutted fitted denim with a leather and suede jacket as she toted the newest issue of US Vogue with Rihanna gracing the cover during her Friday outing.

Gorgeous: Kaia Gerber made the sidewalk her runway as she stepped out in a stylish look while out in Soho on Friday

The teen runway star sported blue denim bottoms, adding black calf-length boots with silver detailing.

Cindy layered a black shirt with a suede and leather cover up with cuffed sleeves; she carried a small black handbag.

The beauty, who is the daughter of Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber, added a silver necklace and small framed sunglasses.

Kaia styled her short tresses center parted and sleek while opting to wear just a touch of makeup.

Denim darling: The 18-year-old model strutted fitted denim with a leather and suede jacket as she toted the newest issue of US Vogue with Rihanna gracing the cover on Friday

Star power: The teen runway star sported blue denim bottoms, adding black calf-length boots with silver detailing

Kaia carried the Rihanna Vogue issue one day prior as well while stepping out with her mom in the Big Apple.

She carried the magazine as she sported an olive dress with a matching blazer, adding a statement belt.

Meanwhile mom Cindy, 53, looked stylish in a blue jumpsuit with a matching blazer, adding a large black handbag.

Casual Friday: Cindy layered a black shirt with a suede and leather cover up with cuffed sleeves; she carried a small black handbag

Vibes: Kaia carried the Rihanna Vogue issue one day prior as well while stepping out with her mom in the Big Apple

Fabulous: She carried the magazine as she sported an olive dress with a matching blazer, adding a statement belt

Family: Meanwhile mom Cindy, 53, looked stylish in a blue jumpsuit with a matching blazer, adding a large black handbag

Earlier in the day, Kaia was seen rocking a plaid jacket with a black top and a baseball cap as she sipped on an iced matcha.

On Thursday, Kaia attended Bella Hadid's 23rd birthday bash at Saks Fifth Avenue's restaurant and bar.

She rocked a black dress with a velvet orange blazer for the celebration.

Break: Earlier in the day, Kaia was seen rocking a plaid jacket with a black top and a baseball cap as she sipped on an iced matcha
description: She attended Bella Hadid's 23rd birthday bash at the restaurant and bar at Saks Fifth Avenue in Manhattan on Thursday night. And one day later, Kaia Gerber made the sidewalk her runway.
